hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Din's Fire# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Second Left Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Deku Shield#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #the Prelude of Light#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Mirror Shield# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Left

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #3# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #2# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Slingshot#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Spirit Temple Small Key# and #a Jail Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: I came here to chew bubblegum and play rando. And I'm all out of bubblegum.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Huge Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Deku Stick# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Long time watcher, first time player. Greetings from Termina. Incentive goes to Randobot's choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.
